abstract: After Friday's aborted start, C.C. Sabathia said he might be able to pitch on Sunday. His manager begs to differ.
snippet: After Friday's aborted start, C.C. Sabathia said he might be able to pitch on Sunday. His manager begs to differ.
lead_paragraph: Joe Girardi made clear Saturday afternoon that he will not allow C.C. Sabathia to persuade him that he should pitch Sunday in Game 2 instead of Game 3 on Monday in Detroit. Girardi confirmed what he said after Friday's game was suspended due to rain - Freddy Garcia will pitch Game 2 on Sunday.

headline.main: Girardi Makes It Clear: Sabathia Won't Pitch Until Monday
